## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 3 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for initial rate, differential PFR operation, half-life, linearized model and differential analysis
* Be able to
    * linearize a reactor model
    * approximate a derivative using finite differences
    * use linear least squares to fit a linearized model to experimental data
